phase.title: Phase
phase.description: Choose discovery of names (Phase 1) or enrichment with phones/emails (Phase 2).

city.title: City/Market
city.description: Target market used for filtering and web queries.

limitPerSource.title: Max agents per source
limitPerSource.description: Soft cap on names to collect from each directory in Phase 1.

sources.title: Site adapters
sources.description: Which agent directories to crawl during Phase 1 (discover).

datasetNamePhase1.title: Dataset name for Phase 1 (optional)
datasetNamePhase1.description: Dataset name tag for Phase 1 results (names JSON/CSV).

namesCsvUrl.title: Names CSV for Phase 2 (optional)
namesCsvUrl.description: Public CSV URL for names (column 'name' or one name per line). Overrides Phase 1 output.

bingApiKey.title: Bing Web Search API key (optional)
bingApiKey.description: Optional key to speed up Phase 2 searching. Actor also works without it.

maxPagesPerName.title: Max result pages per name
maxPagesPerName.description: Safety cap for how many pages to follow for each name during enrichment.

proxyGroups.title: Apify proxy groups (optional)
proxyGroups.description: For example RESIDENTIAL. Leave empty to run without proxies.

brevoExport.title: Also export Brevo CSV (Phase 2)
brevoExport.description: If enabled, writes a Brevo-formatted CSV (EMAIL, SMS, FIRSTNAME, LASTNAME, SOURCEURL).

brevoFileName.title: Brevo CSV file name
brevoFileName.description: Custom file name for the Brevo CSV output.
